details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 19005-2:2011 - 6.5.2 Trigger events - Document
details.description: The document's Catalog shall not include an AA entry for an additional-actions dictionary.

rule.description: The document's Catalog shall not include an AA entry for an additional-actions dictionary.

error.message: The document catalog dictionary contains an additional-actions dictionary (AA entry)
